title: After champion select i get never-ending black screen on BOTH Live and PBE
body:
Basically after champion select i get a black screen and i can't do anything, i can force quit it but even if i try to reconnect it does the same thing even after letting the black screen there for around 13min it still doesn't load me into the game.

Also tried to load a game in PBE but there instead of black screen after champion select, i get a "DirectX Error" along with Bugsplat.

Also i am on a Mac so this could just be a Mac issue, if any more information is need or someone's got a fix for me i'd be really happy

I had a issue like this a month or two ago but that seemed to be fixed after a day so i hope it will go that way again, also saw one more Mac user report on this issue today here on the boards

replies.body:
Hey guys, asked about this and there may be an issue with macs that causing client pop ups to not show properly currently.  For example, you might have a Reconnect button but it's not taking priority on your screen.  

Trying to interact with the client with a popup failing totake priority can cause this crash or bugsplat. **Tapping the Enter key while loading at champ select should accept the pop up and allow you to connect to the game server.**

It's also important to make sure your OS is up to date as well.  Let me know if this helps.
